div.head: Replace with your title.
div.p: Replace with your text. Barbaris is the best and most frutefull, enclofed with the Atlanike, and Mediterato fees, che countries, and the region called Bacha, which coofyacth on Egipt. Nu-media which yeildeth dares &e is of the Arabies called the data countric, is other-wile called Biledulgerid, this becing the Secondparte bordereth on the Aslamile fea in the wett, and the mount Atla in the poith, in rhe calt it rearcheth anto the citie Eloses, and fouth ward vato the fandic deferts of Labia.Laba the third parte is in the Arabeck tonguecalled Sarta, which fignifieth wilder-nelle, is beginnech at the riuer Nites and reatcheth to the Ablaxtyle fea, having on the fouch the Negroes or Moores, and on the north Numedia.The fourth and laft parte is that which is called the conuy of the Negor Moo-xes (for that they are black people) it hath Lia on the north. The ABshopion fca towardes the fouth,the Guess towardes the weitand on the calt lyde the kingdome Eis fanherto be confidered thar all Africa is engroned with the Medierans Milangke and Eshiophion feas and the riuer Niles.Some baue accompted Egit and Chugia to bee of Afa,but with more reaton all moderne Colmographets do recon them to belong to Africa.The foath parte or coale of africe was indifcouered unto the yeare of our Lord 1497 ahat Va/ca de Gama palled the promoacoric or cape de Bans /peras, and farling round about all the fouth coalt of this parte of the world artyued at Cale in the calt Intes.Aftisa hath great and dry deferts wherein many ftrange beates and ferpents are nowrifhed, and in fourepartes there of (as about the riuer Nass fundry new cacatures us monkets are often produced.
